rules_text: Whenever a nontoken Aura or Equipment you control enters, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it. [i](The Aura token can enter attached to any permanent it could enchant, even if it couldn't be targeted.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“I have need of your gift, planeswalker. Swear it to me, and you shall have my protection, my generosity... and a cause worth fighting for.”[/i]
